Containers.Name: User Scripts
Containers.Description: A plugin designed to be a front end to execute user scripts without having to drop down to the command line.
Containers.Changes:
###2016.07.01 - Add in ability to download the script log files
###2016.06.30 - Add in schedules for background scripts
###2016.06.28 - Add in background logging - Fixed: User scripts with spaces would not execute
###2016.06.26 - Add in ability to start as a background task
###2016.06.25 - Initial Release
